23 SC/FR/365/2020: Desire to gain recognition or approval from superiors by reporting
that suspects were apprehended and they admitted committing
Misguided belief among some officers that torture is a reliable or

effective  method  of  extracting 
truthful  confessions,  despite
evidence  to  the  contrary,  as  innocent  individuals  may  falsely
Personal grudges, biases, or prejudices against particular class of
suspects, leading to abuse of power.
